A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie made JarJar seem like a dream. Created an account just to review this movie. It's painfully slow with SJW propaganda blatantly thrown at the audience. Entire scenes with a \"message\". I'm amazed they didn't have someone in engineering on the rebel ship pop in to say fuel won't be a problem\, it's a hybrid ship. I can't believe they put this out and are comfortable charging people to watch it. The blame falls solely on the writers and director. The actors aren't at fault.
